title: Russian coronavirus cases rise as Putin's popularity plunges
description: As confirmed coronavirus cases in Russia continue to increase, President Vladimir Putin's approval rating has plunged to an all-time low. CNN's Matthew Chance reports.

title: Drew Barrymore calls herself 'hot mess' during pandemic
description: CNN's Chloe Melas talks to actress Drew Barrymore about life at home with children during the coronavirus pandemic and the taco Tuesday event she's hosting online to raise money for kids in need.

title: Attorney says Ahmaud Arbery's family wants man who filmed fatal shooting arrested
description: An attorney for the family of Ahmaud Arbery, who was shot and killed in Brunswick, Georgia, in February, says they want the man who recorded the incident arrested despite his attorney's claim that he was not involved in the death.

title: Trump's unorthodox treatment choice flies in the face of evidence
description:
• See Dr. Gupta's reaction to Trump's revelation
• Fox News can't get message straight on hydroxychloroquine

title: What you need to know about coronavirus today
description: President Donald Trump has been ridiculed around the world for touting unproven, and often radical, coronavirus treatments. Now he's back to an old favorite — the anti-malarial drug hydroxychloroquine.

title: Trump threatens to permanently pull US funding from WHO
description:
• Trump says it's OK for Pompeo to have a paid government employee wash dishes if his wife or son isn't there
• Cuomo: Let me tell you why this could be a win for Trump

title: What does US pulling out of the WHO actually mean?
description: President Donald Trump has redoubled his criticism of the World Health Organization, threatening to permanently withdraw funding and cancel US membership, even as it deals with a devastating global pandemic.

title: Egypt's best kept secret
description: It's difficult to imagine a desert oasis with a magical lake, cascading waterfalls, and a valley of ancient whales failing to be listed among a destination's top attractions.

title: A US-China trade war is the last thing the world economy needs now
Trump threatens to permanently pull US funding from WHO
'Precious' footage from 1935 of last-known Tasmanian tiger released
description: Video footage of the last known thylacine, or Tasmanian tiger, has been released by the National Film and Sound Archive of Australia (NFSA).

title: US-China trade war the last thing economy needs
description: Mutual blame over the coronavirus pandemic has reignited tensions between the United States and China, threatening to break what was already a fragile truce on trade between the world's biggest economies.

title: Pastor of a US church that held a Mother's Day livestream service tests positive for coronavirus
description: The pastor of a northern California church has been diagnosed with coronavirus after holding a Mother's Day livestream service with singing, according to officials.

title: India and Bangladesh brace for the strongest storm ever recorded in the Bay of Bengal
Usain Bolt and partner Kasi Bennett welcome baby girl
description: Track and field great Usain Bolt has become a father for the first time after his partner Kasi Bennett gave birth to a baby girl on Sunday, his agent confirmed to CNN Sport.

title: Shakespeare's Globe theater faces permanent closure due to Covid-19 lockdown
description: William Shakespeare's Globe theater, the famous London playhouse where the playwright's shows were performed, faces permanent closure as a result of coronavirus lockdown measures, the theater and UK politicians have warned.

title: Some good news about a vaccine test (though it's still early)
Thai Airways survives for now as government orders overhaul
description: Thailand's flagship carrier will be restructured with the help of a bankruptcy court, making it the latest airline to succumb to pressure from the coronavirus pandemic.

title: The biologist whose advice went viral tells us what to do next
Gothic architecture: Can the 12th-century style radically change how we build today?
description: Little over a year ago the world nearly lost one of its most recognizable examples of Gothic architecture, as the spire and a sizeable part of the roof of the Cathedral of Notre Dame in Paris burned to ashes. Now the debate carries on about what to do with the damaged building. Should the missing spire be restored to its original Gothic form, or updated with something more in line with the architecture of today? And what does it mean to be "Gothic" anyway? If something is Gothic can it also be contemporary? For such questions we need a little background.

title: India and Bangladesh brace for strongest storm ever recorded in Bay of Bengal
'No team changes lives like our team.' How cycling's Team Novo Nordisk turned type 1 diabetes into its 'greatest strength'
description: Phil Southerland wasn't supposed to live past 25, but as a boy he happened upon a treatment that he says helped him to defy medical expectations.

title: Isolating on a desert island: Polish vlogger star skips lockdown
description: It's 5.30 a.m. on Yemen's remote island of Socotra, a 3,625 square kilometer desert paradise 60 miles east of the Horn of Africa.

title: Further delay could make the findings, whatever they are, more inconsequential
description: As Xi Jinping prepared to address the World Health Assembly on Monday, it seemed like the Chinese leader might be in a vulnerable spot.

title: Domino Park circles keep New York City sunbathers in check
description: They could have been a quirky play on the name Domino Park. But the large, painted circles -- spaced six feet apart -- on the grass of one of New York City's newest sunbathing spots serve a very specific purpose.

title: Fox News can't get its message straight on hydroxychloroquine
description: A version of this article first appeared in the "Reliable Sources" newsletter. You can sign up for free right here.

title: UAE's Hope Probe prepares for launch to Mars
description: In Tanegashima, Japan, a spacecraft named Hope is being prepared for its launch towards Mars.

title: All US states will be partially reopened by Memorial Day weekend but only 16 states recorded downward case trends
description: By Memorial Day weekend, every US state will have begun lifting measures enacted weeks ago to curb the spread of coronavirus. Many governors have already pushed into a second phase of reopening their economies, with some states now allowing restaurants, retailers and personal service shops to reopen their doors.

title: Meet 90-year-old Hamako Mori, the world's oldest video game YouTuber
description: A Japanese woman who built a cult following online with her video game skills has been recognized as the world's oldest YouTube gamer — at the age of 90.

title: Facial recognition helps reunite kidnapped toddler with family after 32 years
description: A man who was abducted as a toddler 32 years ago was finally reunited with his biological family Monday, with the help of facial recognition technology.

title: Cuomo: Let me tell you why this could be a win for Trump
description: CNN's Chris Cuomo discusses how Trump taking hydroxychloroquine, despite the FDA warning about the drug, could be a political move.

title: 14-year-old: I'm living proof you need to worry about coronavirus
description: 14-year-old Jack McMorrow was hospitalized with a severe inflammatory syndrome linked to coronavirus. CNN's Don Lemon speaks with McMorrow and his father about their experience.

title: Top adviser traveled to epicenter of China's outbreak to press local authorities
description: CNN's David Culver sits down exclusively with Dr. Zhong Nanshan, who is considered the Dr. Fauci of China. Zhong says the science community in China and the US are still collaborating on Covid-19 research despite differences in politics.

title: Trump's unorthodox treatment choice flies in the face of evidence
Brian Austin Green opens up about split with wife Megan Fox
description: Brian Austin Green has opened up about parting ways with his wife of nearly 10 years, actress Megan Fox.

title: Pelosi takes a shot at Trump's weight when asked about hydroxychloroquine
description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi responds to President Trump's revelation that he is taking hydroxychloroquine despite an FDA warning about the drug.

title: Seychelles bans cruise ships through 2021 to prevent Covid-19 spread
description: The Seychelles is taking the bold step of banning all cruise ship tourism through the end of 2021 as a measure to prevent the spread of the Covid-19 coronavirus.

title: Rabbits are facing a deadly virus of their own
description: A deadly virus is threatening to wipe out entire populations across multiple states. At risk are North America's rabbits.
